mapper.select: SELECT * FROM musicsns.member WHERE mb_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{mbName}, '%')
SELECT * FROM musicsns.member order by mb_update_at desc limit #{offset}, #{contentnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO musicsns.member(mb_id, mb_pw, mb_name, mb_level, mb_ip, mb_use, mb_create_at, mb_update_at) VALUES (#{mbId}, #{mbPw}, #{mbName}, #{mbLevel}, #{mbIp}, #{mbUse}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE musicsns.member SET mb_pw=#{mbPw}, mb_name=#{mbName}, mb_level=#{mbLevel}, mb_ip=#{mbIp}, mb_use=#{mbUse}, mb_update_at=now() WHERE mb_id=#{mbId}
